meanings.definition: A formal suit worn by men for special occasions.
meanings.sent1: At the wedding, all the gentlemen wore tuxedoes.
meanings.sent2: He looked very elegant in his black tuxedoes at the gala.
meanings.sent3: The penguins decided to have a fancy party and wore tiny tuxedoes.
meanings.sent4: His tuxedoes were like a shield of sophistication in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The tuxedoes shimmered under the ballroom lights, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.sent1: In the closet, there were many tuxedoes neatly hung.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on tuxedoes, so he bought three.
meanings.sent3: The penguins were excited to receive their new tuxedoes for the event.
meanings.sent4: The tuxedoes on display in the shop window gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The row of tuxedoes stood out in the sea of casual attire at the party.
